name: Weapon Of A Sith
Lore: 'In order to use his double-bladed weapon Maul trained under Darth Sidious for years.',
Text: 'Plays on table. For opponent to steal a weapon from target character using a non-[Episode I] card, must first draw destiny. If destiny +1 > target''s ability, weapon is stolen. Otherwise, attempt fails and stealing card is placed out of play.',
